Function Documentation

function putFOV ( in  ef_obj,
in  sensor,
in  perm_distrib,
in  fovImgR,
in  method,
in  fillBorder 
)

putFOV returns image where given fov was put into given image

Parameters:
sensor sensor object
perm_distrib permittivity distribution object
fovImgR side size of reconstruction image
method interpolating method for image rescaling (default is bilinear). For more see imresize help.
fillBorder flag, 0-1, extrapolate borders of fov to fill whole fov in simulation resolution (0 no fill, 1 fill, default 0)
Return values:
img resize image
